messages.msgSnippet: Japanese periodical: REI by Ginza Token Shibata. This is a monthly publication featuring fine items available at Token Shibata (prices shown) plus
messages.messageBody:
Japanese periodical: "REI" by Ginza Token Shibata. This is a monthly
publication featuring fine items available at Token Shibata (prices shown)
plus interesting articles. From the March 1995 issue

There is a set of 93 of them on ebay at the moment.

Another pic included here.

Matt
